title: Wheel is turning in Nepal
brief_description: Traditional culture and beginnings of technological change in Nepal. Shows the lifestyle and threatened crafts of Nepal including an introduction to Nepalese/Tibetan/Indian cooking, flour milling, and rice winnowing, wood turning, and pottery, the use of natural resources such as water to power the wood turning lathes and indicates the effects of tourism and increased trade on the native craftsmen.
